text: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
translation: Ibigendagenda biri mu majuru n’ibiri mw’isi, vyose vyubamira Imana Allah; n’abamalayika nyene[338] bubamira Imana Allah, kandi ntibagira amanyama ngo bareke kwicisha bugufi kuri Yo;
footnotes: [338] Imana Allah muri iyi Aayah, Yadomyeko urutoke abamalayika kandi na bo baharurwa mu bigendagenda, ku kubera ubwinshi bwabo n’icubahiro bafise kuri Yo.
